de.esoco.process

Class ProcessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.process.ProcessManager

  • public final class ProcessManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static methods to access and handle processes.

    • Method Summary

      • getProcess

        public static Process getProcess(java.lang.Class<? extends ProcessDefinition> rDefinitionClass)
                          throws ProcessException
        Returns a process instance for a certain process definition class.
        Parameters:
        rDefinitionClass - The process definition class
        Returns:
        The corresponding process instance
        Throws:

      • getProcessResource

        public static java.lang.String getProcessResource(java.lang.Class<? extends ProcessDefinition> rClass)
        Returns a resource string for a certain process class. The returned string will be prefixed with DataElement.ITEM_RESOURCE_PREFIX.
        Parameters:
        rClass - The process class
        Returns:
        The resulting resource string
